gen:link.msg:message: `OperatingLeasesMinimumLeasePaymentsLessors` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseLessorsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_OperatingLeasesMinimumLeasePaymentsLessors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseLessorsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_OperatingLeasesMinimumLeasePaymentsLessors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseLessorsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimumLeasePaymentsLessorsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseLessorsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimumLeasePaymentsLessorsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseLessorsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimumLeasePaymentsLessorsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesAssetsLiabilitiesNotRecognisedOperatingLeaseLessorsBreakdownMaturity_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfOperatingLeasesMinimumLeasePaymentsLessorsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
